Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CKDCriticalSection::CKDCriticalSection ( DWORD  dwSpinCount = 0  ) 

Constructor.

Parameters:
dwSpinCount IN: Spin count for the critical section object. On single-processor systems, the spin count is ignored and the critical section spin count is set to 0 (zero). On multiprocessor systems, if the critical section is unavailable, the calling thread spin dwSpinCount times before performing a wait operation on a semaphore associated with the critical section. If the critical section becomes free during the spin operation, the calling thread avoids the wait operation.

Member Function Documentation

bool CKDCriticalSection::Start ( bool  bWait = true  )  [inline]

Start the critical section.

Parameters:
bWait IN: wait for other process stop or not
Returns:
true if entered critical section. Otherwise false. If set bWait true, always return true.
